data.title: Romain Ferrier EA FC FIFA 07 Career Mode
data.meta_description: Romain Ferrier plays as a Full Back for Niort. In FIFA 07, Ferrier got a rating of 59 and a potential of 65. View all his stats at FIFA Index.
data.text: Romain Ferrier was born on Feb. 24, 1976. He is currently 30 years old and plays as a Full Back for Niort in France. His overall rating in FIFA 07 is 59 with a potential of 65. He prefers to shoot with his left foot. Ferrier's height is 180 cm cm and his weight is estimated at 75 kg kg according to our database. Currently, Romain Ferrier is playing with number 3. His best stats are: Strength: 72, Tackling: 71, Composure: 62, FK Acc.: 62, Stamina: 56.
